item.title: Terms of Use
item.description:
Terms of Use

Last updated: November 2025

General Information

By downloading or using the information provided, you agree to these Terms of Use and acknowledge the information provided in the accompanying Disclaimer, Privacy Policy, and License sections.

License and Usage Rights

Educational and Non-Commercial Purpose

This project is developed primarily for educational and research learning purposes.
It is not intended for professional, clinical, or commercial use.
Any scientific or academic use should be done with proper validation and under the user’s own responsibility.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description:
Privacy Policy

We take the protection of your personal data very seriously. We treat your personal data confidentially and in accordance with the statutory data protection regulations (in particular GDPR) as well as this privacy policy.

For questions regarding data protection you can contact the data protection controller directly.

Collection and storage of personal data

When visiting the website

This website is hosted by GitHub Pages, a service provided by GitHub, Inc.

Disclaimer

Liability for Content

The contents of this website and the associated GitHub repository are created with great care. However, no guarantee can be given for the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of the information provided. As a private service provider, I am responsible for my own content on these pages in accordance with § 7 (1) TMG. According to §§ 8 to 10 TMG, I am not obliged to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity. Obligations to remove or block information under general laws remain unaffected. Liability is only possible from the moment knowledge of a concrete infringement is obtained. Upon becoming aware of such violations, the relevant content will be removed promptly.
